right.text: CERTAINLY GOT YOU THINKING DIDN'T IT? WHICH WAS THE WHOLE POINT!

left.text: tyrannous kept msging me on msn, it sucked. there was one good time though, he was like "do you like bush?" and i was like "there's several kinds of bush, one of which you'll never see in your life"

right.text: you'll faill. all of you. because you can't get your head around the idea that sometime people just do FUCKED UP things cos it's amusing
